name: Broken Sentences
description:
Broken Sentences is a new educational game in which you will test & practice your language skills in an entertaining and challenging way.

The game contains 4 game modes:

* 10 rounds
 * Time attack
 * Practice
 * Editor

Try to unscramble all the sentences with the best score possible or play a relaxing practice mode, that you can play without any time limit or lives!

Do you need to practice with your own sentences or in another language? Visit then EDITOR, in which you can create and play your own scrambled sentences!

How to play: The game is simple to play - there will be shown words on the screen, tap on them and put them into the correct word order as fast as possible. Your score depends on your speed. Watch out, you can make max 10 mistakes in total. Play 10 rounds or a Time Attack in which you have exactly 4 minutes in order to complete as many rounds as you can!
